explanations.machine learning: The paper uses deep learning architectures, which are a subset of machine learning, to forecast the India VIX index.
explanations.deep learning: The study explicitly mentions using six deep learning architectures to predict the movements in the India VIX index.
explanations.neural network: Deep learning architectures are based on neural networks, which are used in this study.
explanations.representation learning: Deep learning involves representation learning as part of its process to model complex patterns in data.
explanations.backpropagation: Backpropagation is a fundamental algorithm used in training deep neural networks, which are employed in this study.
explanations.BP: BP is an abbreviation for backpropagation, which is used in training the deep learning models mentioned.
explanations.hidden layer: Deep learning architectures typically include hidden layers, which are part of the neural networks used in this study.
explanations.recurrent neural network: Given the time-series nature of the data, it is likely that recurrent neural networks (RNNs) were among the architectures used.
explanations.long short-term memory: LSTM networks, a type of RNN, are commonly used for time-series forecasting, which aligns with the study's focus.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is an abbreviation for long short-term memory networks, which are likely used in the study for forecasting the VIX index.
